PreceptDef.label: unecessary
PreceptDef.description: To focus in one's perception of what's better is unecessary, but acceptable in the lack of authority. To force someone to manage themselves is wrong.

PreceptDef.label: neutral
PreceptDef.description: The work must be done wether it is tasked by someone else or myself.

PreceptDef.label: wanted
PreceptDef.description: Free people should be able to decide how to manage themselves. To force someone to follow orders is wrong.
